LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_FA47_Core.label: F/A-47 "Arsenal Angel" frame
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_FA47_Core.description: A Dragoon with outer space combat capabilities, used by the Colonial Fleet Orbital Cavalry. Its fully enclosed shell is made of plasteel. can carry a propulsion system capable of short-distance suborbital flights on the planet's surface.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_FA47_Helmet.label: F/A-47 "Arsenal Angel" helmet
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_FA47_Helmet.description: A complex synthetic caliber sensor module used by colonial fleets on dragoons used in space operations, It can effectively track high-speed moving enemies and assist pilot in aiming.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_FA47_Core.label: F/A-47 "Arsenal Angel" core module
LanguageData.DMS_Module_FA47_Core.description: A Dragoon with outer space combat capabilities, used by the Colonial Fleet Orbital Cavalry. Its fully enclosed shell is made of plasteel. can carry a propulsion system capable of short-distance suborbital flights on the planet's surface.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_FA47_Helmet.label: F/A-47 "Arsenal Angel" helmet
LanguageData.DMS_Module_FA47_Helmet.description: A complex synthetic caliber sensor module used by colonial fleets on dragoons used in space operations, It can effectively track high-speed moving enemies and assist pilot in aiming.
